body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky farmer and sheriff. Married Elizabeth Banta. Father of Judy Banta and John P. Banta. Held eight slaves in 1860. Nicholas County sheriff in 1861. Served as a private in the 1st Battalion, Kentucky Mounted Rifles from 1861 to 1862, then in 9th Regiment, Kentucky Cavalry (Confederate), Company B, after December 1862.
